mapper.select: select LEVEL, CATENAME, CATECODE, CATECODEREF from GOODS_CATEGORY start with CATECODEREF is null connect by prior CATECODE = CATECODEREF
select LEVEL, CATENAME, CATECODE, CATECODEREF from GOODS_CATEGORY start with CATECODE = #{navNo} connect by prior CATECODE = CATECODEREF
select LEVEL, CATENAME, CATECODE, CATECODEREF from GOODS_CATEGORY WHERE LEVEL = 1 start with CATECODEREF = #{navNo} connect by prior CATECODE = CATECODEREF
